title: Silent Night Sona
body: I have a question Riot, are you guys releasing the Silent Night Sona skin{{champion:37}}  this coming Christmas or December? because I am a fan of Sona and I joined the Fields of Justice (or just League of Legends :P) later and I found out about the Silent Night Sona so I was wondering if you're going to release it this Christmas, I would love it if I could get an answer sometime later today. Sincerely yours. a player

replies.body:
Hiya! 

She's legacy, which means she'll periodically make an appearance to the store. In the past, she has made appearances in the winter.

*extremely deep inhale* Red Red Red Red Red Red Red Red Red Red

Do you guys just have a policy of not commenting on the Skins & Champion Concepts Boards (I mean, I could see why, you could get someone's hopes up or something) or do you guys simply not have the time to just look all the stuff over?
Alright thanks for giving me an answer,  I guess I'll can bide my time until then,
